casebody.data:
ORLANDO PETROLEUM COMPANY v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE. No. 78. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Aug. 7, 1930. Lillard, Hurd & Eidson, of Topeka, Kan., for petitioner. C. M. Charest, Gen. Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, of Washington, D. C., for respondent.

Before LEWIS, PHILLIPS, and McDERMOTT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed August 7, 1930, per stipulation.
